mapper.select: SELECT usr.usr_id AS id, usr.usr_first_name AS firstName, usr.usr_surname AS surname, usr.usr_gender AS gender, usr.usr_email AS email FROM t_user usr WHERE usr.usr_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (usr_first_name, usr_surname, usr_gender, usr_email, usr_active) VALUES (#{user.firstName}, #{user.surname}, #{user.gender.id}, #{user.email}, #{user.active});
